features: 【3 Color Modes & Ajustable Brightness】Hollywood vanity mirror with 9 high quality Led bulbs with 3 adjustable brightness lighting modes Warm/Cool/Color Mixed, no matter in the morning Or late night, adjust different brightness and modes to meet your different makeup needs.

【Smart Touch Control & Memory Function】Vanity mirror simply turn On/Off the Led bulbs by press the middle button. Press “M” button to change the color modes. Long press “P” button to adjust the led brightness. And the intelligent light memory function make you easy to use the suitable light adjusted last time.

【Detachable 10x Magnifying Mirror & 360°Rotation】Lighted Vanity Mirror come with a 10x magnifying mirror to help applying mascara, eyeliner, eyebrow and lipstick. 360° free rotation can fix at any position, giving you a perfect viewing angle, creating flawless and delicate makeup

【Products Size & Specification】Small vanity mirror size is L12''*W1.2''*H14.4'', the mirror size is L9.8''*W1.2''*12''. The 9 LED bulbs vanity mirror frame and base are made of strong metal, tightly wrap and protect the mirror. The 9 frosted led bulbs can be used continuously with 50,000 hours life span. Every vanity mirror lights are strictly tested before ship out.

【A Great Gifts & Our Warranty】Makeup Vanity Mirror With Lights is a great gift for the people you loved in any festival or celebrating days. For the products we provides lifetime refund and replacements service, if you have any query, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vanity mirror with lights
reviews.reviewText: The brightness and color temperature of the LEDs are adjusted at the touch of a button to suit a variety of lighting conditions I am able to set the stage for an ideal environment for flawless treatment using time ready, whether it’s for a daytime event or a night out. Nine LED lights surrounding the mirror provide ambient lighting that is soft, and beautiful and evokes natural daylight. This activity has been a game-changer as it removes any harsh shadows that can affect the look of the final cosmetic product. When I started using this lens, I noticed a huge improvement in my blending accuracy and color accuracy. The removable magnifying glass is a helpful aid for tasks that require attention to detail. These magnifying lenses ensure that no details are visible, whether that is by straightening the lens, the shape of the lens, dramatic ornamentation, or enlarging the size of the image. The fact that it can be removed makes it extravagant because it allows it to be used freely if needed. The strong, refined feel of the materials combined with the modern, white style makes this the perfect product for my taste. The glass shape is excellent; It allows me to explore every part of my face without taking up too much space on my naughty dressing table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service.
reviews.reviewText: Love this mirror. It’s my first make up mirror and I couldn’t go back now. After a few months it wouldn’t turn on tho, I emailed the company honestly not expecting much. They got back to me a day later and suggested I try a new power cord, I got a new one but still nothing. I emailed back saying that and within a week later I had received a new mirror from them. Super happy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Am Getting Pretty
reviews.reviewText: This is a plug-in vanity light that mimics the style of the massive vanity's beloved by A-listers in Hollywood; however, it is designed to sit on your dresser, vanity, etc., and this is exactly what I've been looking for. It has nine powerful LED lamps and three different brightness settings (warm, cold, and mixed color). I have a wide range of brightness and setting options to suit my needs. A small mirror that can be detached from the device increases the reflection by a factor of 10.The mirror may be controlled with a touch screen and includes a memory feature. The center button toggles them on and off. To switch between color modes, I push the "M" button. While holding down the "P" button, it lets me control the brightness. The fact that the bulbs are included and rated for continuous use for up to 50,000 hours is a nice bonus. I can use this for all of my cosmetic purposes, and the price is reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mirror came packaged well, no cracks or broken glass! All the lightbulbs work well and it is very bright! The whole mirror feels like really good quality it’s got weight to it and the bulbs don’t feel plasticky either. I’m very impressed and happy with this purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute lamp, great lighting options
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my sister to do her makeup with. She uses it every day, and love's how you can adjust it to be whatever light hue or brightness you want it to be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my daughter and she absolutely loves it. It fits perfectly on her desk to use for make up. The light can be dim or bright and everything is included, we did not have to purchase the bulbs separate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I thought this would plug in or have batteries, but it won't turn on without the USB connection which is not convenient. That is its only way to work. It is a good mirror, however.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lighted makeup mirror
reviews.reviewText: Love this mirror. Perfect size and lights up well.
The media could not be loaded. It's easy to assemble and just about the size for teenagers. Bought this for my daughter's room. She's 19 years
